name: headband
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a narrow strip of material worn around the head, usually to keep your hair or sweat out of your eyes, for example when doing sports: He wore a red headband with the NBA logo. Synonym
sweatband
Jacqueline Veissid/DigitalVision/GettyImages
US (UK hairband) a strip of cloth or a curved plastic strip worn in the hair, that fits closely over the top of the head and behind the ears: Accentuate cheekbones by pulling hair off your face with a headband.
rgbdigital/iStock/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesAt the time, I wore one of those white terrycloth headbands . It was the '70s, OK? He appeared before the game at Fenway Park wearing a headband instead of a cap.The child was fitted with a headband that held hearing aids.With a soft brush, gently smooth the front section over your "Bardot bouffant", then slide on a skinny headband.
